DOC.brief_summary: Patients with stage IV or recurrent stage I-III NSCLC with documented disease control (objective response or stable disease) within 3 weeks after platinum based 1st line chemotherapy; only HLA-A*0201 positive patients with TERT expressing tumors will be included. The objective of the trial is survival rate at 12 months.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Study of Vx001 Vaccine in NSCLC Patients
